text: The Sulaiman markhor or straight-horned markhor (Capra falconeri jerdoni) is a goat that lives in Asia. It is a subspecies of Capra falconeri. Some scientists say it is the same subspecies as the Kabul markhor and others say they are two different subspecies. ==References== Category:Caprids Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Sulaiman markhor
